books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel about the American Dream and the roaring twenties.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: An intimate, powerful, and inspiring memoir by the former First Lady of the United States.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: A science fiction saga about politics, religion, and humanity.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after a shocking act of violence.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A groundbreaking narrative of humanity's creation and evolution.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian regime that uses surveillance and propaganda to control society.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel about love, society, and class distinctions in early 19th century England.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: A memoir about a woman who escapes her strict upbringing to pursue education and self-discovery.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A story about teenage rebellion and angst, narrated by Holden Caulfield.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy adventure about Bilbo Baggins and his quest to reclaim a lost treasure.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A tale of a shepherd boy's journey to discover his personal legend.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A poignant story of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

books.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
books.author: Mark Manson
books.description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life.

books.title: Brave New World
books.author: Aldous Huxley
books.description: A dystopian novel exploring a technologically advanced but dehumanized society.
